name: Ocean View Suite
description: A spacious suite with a breathtaking view of the ocean, featuring a king-sized bed, a private balcony, and modern amenities for a luxurious stay.

name: Executive Suite
description: This elegant suite offers a panoramic city view, a separate living area, and a state-of-the-art entertainment system, ideal for both business and leisure travelers.

description: Experience unparalleled comfort in our Luxury King Room, featuring premium bedding, a spacious bathroom with a soaking tub, and chic decor.
